kit.leader_skill: "Hybrid Saiyans", "Youth" or "Defenders of Justice" Category Ki +2, HP +150% and ATK & DEF +130%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +20% for characters who also belong to the "Siblings' Bond", "Bond of Parent and Child" or "Bond of Friendship" Category

super_attack.name: No Forgiveness for Evil!
super_attack.effect: Causes supreme damage to enemy; Raises chance of performing a critical hit; by 10% for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: Core of the New-Generation Fighters
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 100% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained; When receiving an attack: DEF 100% up; When there is another "Hybrid Saiyans" or "Bond of Parent and Child" Category ally on the team: ATK 100% up when attacking; All allies' ATK & DEF 10% up and chance of performing a critical hit 5% up (self excluded); 1 or more Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained: DEF 100% up; Damage reduction rate 10% up; ATK 100% up when attacking
